# GET /v1/apps/{id}/appEvents | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/appEvents ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appevents)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/appEvents 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/appEvents

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appevents#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/appEvents
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appevents#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appevents#query-parameters)

`fields[appEventLocalizations]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `locale, name, shortDescription, longDescription, appEvent, appEventScreenshots, appEventVideoClips``fields[appEvents]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `referenceName, badge, eventState, deepLink, purchaseRequirement, primaryLocale, priority, purpose, territorySchedules, archivedTerritorySchedules, localizations``filter[eventState]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `DRAFT, READY_FOR_REVIEW, WAITING_FOR_REVIEW, IN_REVIEW, REJECTED, ACCEPTED, APPROVED, PUBLISHED, PAST, ARCHIVED``filter[id]``[string]`

`include``[string]`

 Value: `localizations``limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200``limit[localizations]``integer`

 Maximum: `50`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appevents#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppEventsResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventsresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-appevents#see-also)
